When i said “it’s an error now” I meant that it errors on master. And erroring is the correct thing to do in this situation.

body:
When i said “it’s an error now” I meant that it errors on master.

And erroring is the correct thing to do in this situation.

On Sat, Jun 30, 2018 at 12:45 Oktai Tatanov <notifications@github.com>
wrote:
